pdf.head:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
PO Box 69
5655 Hwy 12 W
Maple Plain MN 55359
Toll Free: 800-362-3500 Phone: 763-479-2501
Fax: 763-479-1061
LOGO 2
Del Moines IA
515-954-9273
www.herculift.com
Siuox Falls SD
515-954-9273
Maple Plain
763-479-2501 Grand Rapids MN
218-326-0539 St. Cloud MN
320-251-9001 Fargo ND
701-219-5311 Minot ND
701-839-5820 Williston ND
300-362-3500 Boscobe WI
300-362-3500 Milwaukee WI
889-244-6802
Parts Estimate
Date: ${record.trandate}
Order No: ${record.tranid}
Page:
Bill To:${record.billaddress}
Ship To:${record.shipaddress}
pdf.body:
<#if (record.item?is_collection && record.item?has_content) || (record.expense?is_collection && record.expense?has_content)><#if (record.item?is_collection && record.item?has_content) && (record.expense?is_collection && record.expense?has_content)>${record.item@label}/${record.expense@label}

    
        
            

                ${record.item[0].item@label}/${record.expense[0].account@label}
                ${record.item[0].quantity@label}
                ${record.item[0].taxrate1@label}
                <#if record.item[0].tax1amt@label?length != 0>
                    ${record.item[0].tax1amt@label}
                </#if>
                <#if record.item[0].taxrate2@label?length != 0>
                    ${record.item[0].taxrate2@label}
                </#if>
                ${record.item[0].rate@label}
                ${record.item[0].amount@label}
            
        

        
        <#list record.item as item>
            

                ${item.item}
                ${item.quantity}
                ${item.taxrate1}
                <#if item.tax1amt?has_content>
                    ${item.tax1amt}
                </#if>
                <#if item.taxrate2?has_content>
                    ${item.taxrate2}
                </#if>
                ${item.rate}
                ${item.amount}
            
        </#list>

        
        <#list record.expense as expense>
            

                ${expense.account}
                 
                
                ${expense.taxrate1}
                <#if expense.tax1amt?has_content>
                ${expense.tax1amt}
                </#if><#if expense.taxrate2?has_content>
                ${expense.taxrate2}
                        </#if>
                 
                        
                ${expense.amount}
            
        </#list>
    
<#elseif record.item?is_collection && record.item?has_content> 
    ${record.item@label}

    
        
            

                ${record.item[0].item@label}
                ${record.item[0].quantity@label}

                ${record.item[0].taxrate1@label}
                <#if record.item[0].tax1amt@label?length != 0>
                ${record.item[0].tax1amt@label}
                </#if><#if record.item[0].taxrate2@label?length != 0>
                    ${record.item[0].taxrate2@label}
                </#if>
                ${record.item[0].rate@label}
                ${record.item[0].amount@label}

            
        

        
        <#list record.item as item>
            

                ${item.item}
                ${item.quantity}

                ${item.taxrate1}
                <#if item.tax1amt?has_content>
                    ${item.tax1amt}
                </#if>
                <#if item.taxrate2?has_content>
                    ${item.taxrate2}
                </#if>
                ${item.rate}
                ${item.amount}

            
        </#list>
    
<#else> 
    ${record.expense@label}

    
    
        

            ${record.expense[0].account@label}
            ${record.expense[0].taxrate1@label}
            <#if record.expense[0].tax1amt@label?length != 0>
                ${record.expense[0].tax1amt@label}
            </#if>
        <#if record.expense[0].taxrate2@label?length != 0>
            ${record.expense[0].taxrate2@label}
        </#if>
        ${record.expense[0].amount@label}
        
        
        
        <#list record.expense as expense>
            

                ${expense.account}
                ${expense.taxrate1}
                <#if expense.tax1amt?has_content>
                    ${expense.tax1amt}
                </#if>
                <#if expense.taxrate2?has_content>
                    ${expense.taxrate2}
                </#if>
                ${expense.amount}
            
        </#list>
    
</#if>

 

    <#if record.taxtotal?has_content>
        

             
            ${record.taxtotal@label}
            ${record.taxtotal}
        
    </#if>
    <#if record.tax2total?has_content>
        

             
            ${record.tax2total@label}
            ${record.tax2total}
        
    </#if>



</#if>
